issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Same animation style behaves differently for iPhone and ipad.

Steps to reproduce:

1. Go to Kitchensink> Base UI> Views> Option dialog.
2. Click on Show w/hide, animated button.

Actual: 
On iPad
Option dialog disappears with cross dissolve animation.

On iPhone
Option dialog disappears with down animation.

Expected:
Animation should be same on all devices.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink - Same animation style behaves differently for iPhone and ipad
fields.environment:
SDK:3.1.1.v20130514180723
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.1.201305141618
OS: OSX 10.7.5
Device:iPad2(v 5.1)
Xcode: 4.6

comments.body: It is a native iOS behavior (per Sabil). So, this is an invalid bug.Closing.
